alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Garland, southwestern Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hot Springs Village to near Hot Springs. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Rockport... Lonsdale... Hot Springs National Park... Magnet Cove... Red Oak... Nance... Mountain Valley... Glen Rose... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Crows... Owensville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
